00014 // Add local class RegisterThread
00015 #include "RegisterThread.h"

00017 using namespace std;

00019 using namespace Omiscid;

00022 /* @brief Usage function */
00023 void BrowsingUsage(char * ProgramName)
00024 {
00025     OmiscidError( "%s is used to demonstrate User Friendly browsing methods using OMiSCID.\n", ProgramName );
00026     OmiscidError( "Usage: %s \n", ProgramName );
00027 }
00028
00029 namespace Omiscid
00030 {
00031 class BrowseListener : public ServiceRepositoryListener
00032 {
00033 public:
00034     void ServiceAdded( ServiceProxy& ProxyForService );
00035     void ServiceRemoved( ServiceProxy& ProxyForService );
00036 };
00037
00038 }
00039
00040 void BrowseListener::ServiceAdded( ServiceProxy& ProxyForService )
00041 {
00042     cout << ProxyForService.GetName() << " (" << ProxyForService.GetPeerIdAsString() << ") appear.\n";
00043 }
00044
00045 void BrowseListener::ServiceRemoved( ServiceProxy& ProxyForService )
00046 {
00047     cout << ProxyForService.GetName() << " (" << ProxyForService.GetPeerIdAsString() << ") disappear.\n";
00048 }
00049
00050
00051 /* @brief main program entry. No need to give parameter */
00052 int main(int argc, char*argv[] )
00053 {
00054     unsigned int i;
00055     int j;
00056
00057     // Create an even in order to Stop when we want
00058     Event Forever;
00059
00060     // Constant values
00061     // The number of service to register
00062     const unsigned int NumberOfServicesToRegister = 10;
00063
00064     // A variable to store pointers on RegisterThread
00065     RegisterThread * pRegThread;
00066
00067     // parsing parameters, 0 is the program name
00068     for( j = 1 ; j < argc; j++ )
00069     {
00070         if ( argv[j][0] != '-' )
00071         {
00072             OmiscidError( "Bad parameter '%s'. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j] );
00073             BrowsingUsage(argv[0]);
00074             return -1;
00075         }
00076
00077         // Do the user ask for help
00078         if ( strcmp( argv[j], "-h" ) == 0 ||
00079              strcmp( argv[j], "-help" ) == 0 ||
00080              strcmp( argv[j], "--help" ) == 0 )
00081         {
00082             BrowsingUsage(argv[0]);
00083         }
00084
00085         OmiscidError( "Bad parameter '%s'. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j] );
00086         BrowsingUsage(argv[0]);
00087         return -1;
00088     }
00089
00090     // A simple list to store RegisterThread objects
00091     SimpleList<RegisterThread*> ListOfRegisterThreads;
00092
00093     // Variables to Compute Statics
00094     unsigned int EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices = 0;
00095
00096     // Print Welcome message
00097     OmiscidMessage( "This program is used to demonstrate register and search methods using OMiSCID.\n" );
00098     OmiscidMessage( "As it is ditributed, registering unique service and searching for services\n" );
00099     OmiscidMessage( "is a huge processing. See Accumulator/ClientAccumator examples for communication schema.\n\n" );
00100
00101 // Register services
00102     OmiscidMessage( "Start to register services.\n" );
00103
00104     // Create an object to now when the total time
00105     // To register the services
00106     ElapsedTime TimeCounter;
00107
00108     for( i = 1; i <= NumberOfServicesToRegister; i++ )
00109     {
00110         // Create a new register service called
00111         pRegThread = new OMISCID_TLM RegisterThread(i);
00112
00113         // if ok
00114         if ( pRegThread )
00115         {
00116             // add it to my list of threads
00117             ListOfRegisterThreads.Add( pRegThread );
00118         }
00119     }
00120
00121     // Get number of waited services
00122     EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices = ListOfRegisterThreads.GetNumberOfElements();
00123
00124     // Wait until all registered services are present
00125     OmiscidMessage( "Wait for service to be ready.\n" );
00126     for(;;)
00127     {
00128         // Wait for all create thread to register their service
00129         if ( (unsigned int)RegisterThread::NbRegistered == EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices )
00130         {
00131             break;
00132         }
00133
00134         // If not done, wait 10 ms maximum for a new service registration
00135         RegisterThread::NewServiceIsRegistered.Wait(10);
00136     }
00137
00138     OmiscidMessage( "=> %d service(s) are registered in %u ms.\n", EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices, TimeCounter.Get() );
00139
00140 // Create a repository for Omiscid services !
00141
00142     // First create a listener Object
00143     BrowseListener BrowsingForServices;
00144
00145     // Now create the repository
00146     ServiceRepository * BrowseObject = ServiceFactory.CreateServiceRepository();
00147
00148     if ( BrowseObject == (ServiceRepository *)NULL )
00149     {
00150             cerr << "Cound not create ServiceRepository. Exit." << endl;
00151             goto FreeAndExit;
00152     }
00153
00154     fprintf( stderr, "Add BrowseCallback object to the repository and wait for 5 seconds.\n" );
00155     fprintf( stderr, "All available services must appear.\n" );
00156     // Add it as listener of the ServiceRepository object
00157     // We want to be notified for all services (already registered and news ones)
00158     if ( BrowseObject->AddListener( &BrowsingForServices ) == false )
00159     {
00160             cerr << "Cound not ad ServiceRepository listener. Exit." << endl;
00161             goto FreeAndExit;
00162     }
00163
00164     Thread::Sleep( 5000 );
00165
00166     fprintf( stderr, "Remove BrowseCallback object to the repository (no notification).\n" );
00167     fprintf( stderr, "Nothing must be listed in the 5 next seconds.\n" );
00168     if ( BrowseObject->RemoveListener( &BrowsingForServices ) == false )
00169     {
00170             cerr << "Cound not ad ServiceRepository listener. Exit." << endl;
00171             goto FreeAndExit;
00172     }
00173
00174     Thread::Sleep( 5000 );
00175
00176     // Add it as listener of the ServiceRepository object
00177     // We want to be notified only for new services
00178     fprintf( stderr, "Add BrowseCallback object to the repository (ask notification only for new events).\n" );
00179     fprintf( stderr, "Nothing must appear as all services are already here. Wait 5 seconds.\n" );
00180     if ( BrowseObject->AddListener( &BrowsingForServices, true ) == false )
00181     {
00182             cerr << "Cound not ad ServiceRepository listener. Exit." << endl;
00183             goto FreeAndExit;
00184     }
00185
00186     Thread::Sleep( 5000 );
00187     fprintf( stderr, "Nothing appears (hopefully) ?\n" );
00188     fprintf( stderr, "Add a new service. As it is a new event, this one should appear. Wait for 5 seconds\n" );
00189
00190     // Create a new register service called
00191     pRegThread = new OMISCID_TLM RegisterThread(i);
00192
00193     // if ok
00194     if ( pRegThread )
00195     {
00196         // add it to my list of threads
00197         ListOfRegisterThreads.Add( pRegThread );
00198     }
00199
00200     Thread::Sleep( 5000 );
00201
00202     fprintf( stderr, "Remove BrowseCallback object to the repository (request to be notified as if services disappears).\n" );
00203     fprintf( stderr, "All services should be marked as disappear). Wait for 5 seconds.\n" );
00204     if ( BrowseObject->RemoveListener( &BrowsingForServices, true ) == false )
00205     {
00206             cerr << "Cound not ad ServiceRepository listener. Exit." << endl;
00207             goto FreeAndExit;
00208     }
00209
00210     Thread::Sleep( 5000 );
00211
00212 FreeAndExit:
00213
00214     // printf use for autotest
00215     printf( "Test ok.\n" );
00216
00217     fprintf( stderr, "Cleanup everything.\n" );
00218
00219     // Free ServiceRepository object
00220     if ( BrowseObject != (ServiceRepository *)NULL )
00221     {
00222         delete BrowseObject;
00223     }
00224
00225     // printf use for autotest
00226     printf( "Test ok.\n" );
00227     fflush( stdout );
00228
00229 // Unregister service and close all connections
00230     fprintf( stderr, "Unregister service and close all connections.\n" );
00231     // Reset time counter
00232     TimeCounter.Reset();
00233     // Delete registered thread
00234     while( ListOfRegisterThreads.IsNotEmpty() )
00235     {
00236         delete ListOfRegisterThreads.ExtractFirst();
00237     }
00238     fprintf( stderr, "=> done in %u ms.\n", TimeCounter.Get() );
00239
00240 #ifdef WIN32
00241     // Stop here forever as express in the folowing code
00242     Forever.Wait();
00243 #endif
00244 
00245     // exit
00246     return 0;
00247 }
